name.ja: バレットフォースオリジナル
name.th: บูลเลตฟอร์ซ เวอร์ชันต้นฉบับ
name.vi: Danh sách lực lượng Ban đầu

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Bullet Force Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Bullet Force Original като разширение на Chrome - Можете да играете и без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juega a Bullet Force Original como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.cs: Hrajte Bullet Force Original jako Chrome rozšíření - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to nyní!
short.da: Spil Bullet Force Original som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spilles uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Juega a Bullet Force Original como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin conexión a internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.el: Juega a Bullet Force Original como una extensión de Chrome. Además, puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega a Bullet Force Original como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Jouez à Bullet Force Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez aussi jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant !
short.fi: Pelaa Bullet Force -alkuperäistä Chromen laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internet-yhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Bullet Force Original bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin itong laruin kahit walang internet, subukan mo ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Bullet Force Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans connexion Internet, essayez-le…
short.he: Play Bullet Force Original as a Chrome extension - Also play without internet, try it now!
short.hi: Juega a Bullet Force Original como una extensión de Chrome: ¡También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.hr: Igrajte Bullet Force Original kao Chrome ekstenziju - Možete igrati i bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játssza a Bullet Force eredeti verzióját Chrome kiterjesztésként - Az internet nélküli játék is elérhető, próbálja ki most!
short.id,ms: Mainkan Bullet Force Original sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga bisa dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Gioca a Bullet Force Originale come estensione di Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza connessione internet, provalo ora!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてBullet Force Originalをプレイしましょう。また、オフラインでもプレイすることができます。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 Bullet Force Original을 플레이해보세요 - 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite "Bullet Force Original" kaip "Chrome" išplėtimą - taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet "Bullet Force Original" kā Chrome paplašinājumu - joprojām varat spēlēt bez interneta, izmēģiniet tagad!
short.nl: Speel Bullet Force Original als een Chrome-extensie - Je kunt ook spelen zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Speel Bullet Force Original as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan dit ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.pl: Zagraj w oryginalny Bullet Force jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz również grać bez połączenia internetowego, spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Bullet Force Original ca pe o extensie Chrome - Poți juca și fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в оригинал Bullet Force в виде расширения Chrome - Также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Speel Bullet Force Original as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.sr: Играјте Bullet Force Оригинал као Хром екстензију - Такође можете играти без интернета, пробајте сада!
short.sv: Spela Bullet Force Original som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan även spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Bullet Force Original เป็นส่วนเสริมของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้เลย!
short.tr: Bullet Force Original'u bir Chrome uzantısı olarak oynayın - Ayrıca internet olmadan da oynayabilirsiniz, hemen deneyin!
short.uk: Jouez à Bullet Force Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans internet, essayez maintenant !
short.vi: Chơi Bullet Force Ban chuẩn là một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay!
short.zh_CN: 在Chrome扩展中玩原版子弹力量-也可以离线玩，现在来试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中播放原創的「Bullet Force」，也可以在沒有網路的情況下播放，現在試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lock and load for an adrenaline-pumping experience with Bullet Force Original, the unblocked and original first-person shooter that thrusts you into the heart of intense battles. 🎮 Customize your loadout, join the fray, and prove your skills in this action-packed multiplayer shooter.

🔥 High-Octane Multiplayer Action: Immerse yourself in fast-paced multiplayer battles featuring a variety of game modes. From classic Team Deathmatch to Capture the Flag, it offers diverse and thrilling gameplay.

🔫 Customizable Loadouts: Tailor your arsenal to match your playstyle. Choose from a wide array of weapons, attachments, and equipment to create the ultimate loadout. Whether you prefer close-quarters combat or long-range precision, it has you covered.

🌐 Unblocked & Original: Enjoy without restrictions or interruptions. Dive into the unblocked and original version, experiencing the full spectrum of intense firefights and tactical gameplay.

🗺️ Dynamic Maps: Battle across a range of meticulously designed maps, each offering unique challenges and strategic opportunities. Master the terrain, adapt to the surroundings, and outsmart your opponents.

👥 Global Player Base: Join forces with players from around the world or go head-to-head in thrilling one-on-one duels. The global player base ensures that every match is a dynamic and competitive experience.

🎖️ Earn Your Stripes: Progress through ranks and unlock new weapons and upgrades as you demonstrate your combat prowess. From a rookie to a seasoned veteran, the journey is paved with gunfire and glory.


🏆 Become the Ultimate Warrior: Are you ready to step onto the battlefield, showcase your marksmanship, and dominate the competition? Load up, aim true, and let the bullets fly in this game! 💣🎯

Play more games on the top-left menu.
On clicking the FULL button , it opens a url which has other game.
